docs.snippet: An invasion of armyworms is stripping southern Africa of key food crops and could spread to other parts of the continent, experts warned Tuesday at an emergency meeting of 16 African nations....
docs.lead_paragraph: An invasion of armyworms is stripping southern Africa of key food crops and could spread to other parts of the continent, experts warned Tuesday at an emergency meeting of 16 African nations.

headline.main: Armyworm Invasion Threatening Southern Africa's Crops
headline.print_headline: Armyworm Invasion Threatening Southern Africa's Crops

docs.snippet: A New York City jury on Tuesday found a former delicatessen worker guilty of murdering Etan Patz, a 6-year-old boy whose disappearance had been one of the highest-profile unsolved cases in the United States for nearly 40 years....
docs.lead_paragraph: A New York City jury on Tuesday found a former delicatessen worker guilty of murdering Etan Patz, a 6-year-old boy whose disappearance had been one of the highest-profile unsolved cases in the United States for nearly 40 years.

headline.main: Murder Conviction Ends Infamous 1979 Missing Child Case in N.Y.
headline.print_headline: Murder Conviction Ends Infamous 1979 Missing Child Case in N.Y.

docs.snippet: Airlines canceled 1.17 percent of scheduled domestic flights last year, the best performance in the 22 years the government has been tracking the issue, the U.S. Transportation Department said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Airlines canceled 1.17 percent of scheduled domestic flights last year, the best performance in the 22 years the government has been tracking the issue, the U.S. Transportation Department said on Tuesday.

headline.main: U.S. Flight Cancellations, Baggage Problems Fall to Historic Lows

docs.snippet: A senior U.S. Senate Republican said on Tuesday that the resignation of President Donald Trump's national security adviser, Michael Flynn, would "add momentum" to congressional investigation of Russia's involvement in the 2016 U.S. election....

docs.snippet: The 1799 act bars private citizens from interfering in U.S. diplomatic relations — raising questions about whether the act applies to Michael T. Flynn and the presidential transition team....
docs.lead_paragraph: The 1799 act bars private citizens from interfering in U.S. diplomatic relations — raising questions about whether the act applies to Michael T. Flynn and the presidential transition team.

headline.main: The Logan Act: How Flynn’s Exit Revived Interest in a Dusty, Old Law
headline.print_headline: An Unexpected Resignation Brings a Statute From 1799 Into Sharper Focus

docs.snippet: Italy arrested 11 people for running an international gold laundering ring on Tuesday that melted down and sold some 300,000 euros (255,146.68 pounds) worth of the stolen metal each week, Italian finance police said....
